plot: We are nothing more than the life we have led. The memories formed. The wisdom earned. As an old man recounts a fantastical tale from his past we share with him the wisdom earned through the age of life.
title: Donna Luciana
plot_es: We are nothing more than the life we have led. The memories formed. The wisdom earned. As an old man recounts a fantastical tale from his past we share with him the wisdom earned through the age of life.
plot_en: We are nothing more than the life we have led. The memories formed. The wisdom earned. As an old man recounts a fantastical tale from his past we share with him the wisdom earned through the age of life.
